method.name: GET
method.doc: Returns Tumblr post content for the given user.

param.name: start

param.name: num
param.doc: The number of posts to return. The default is 20, and the maximum is 50.

option.doc: Plain text only. No HTML.

param.name: tagged
param.doc: Return posts with this tag in reverse-chronological order (newest first). Optionally specify chrono=1 to sort in chronological order (oldest first).

param.name: chrono
param.doc: If tagged is specified, this parameter specifies to sort in chronological order (oldest first).

param.name: search
param.doc: Search for posts with this query.

param.name: callback
param.doc: When using JSON output, a function name to call with the JSON object as its only parameter. When set, the function will be called instead of the tumblr_api_read variable being set.

param.name: debug
param.doc: If specified, returns a human-readable map of the JSON array's structure for easy reference, if JSON output is specified. The output will be like that of PHP's print_r() function.
